hotels.name: Ocean View Hotel
hotels.details: A beautiful beachfront hotel with sea-facing rooms and top-class service.

hotels.name: Mountain Bliss Resort
hotels.details: A cozy mountain resort with snow views, bonfires, and indoor games.

hotels.details: A modern hotel in the heart of the city with fast WiFi and cafe.

hotels.name: Desert Dune Stay
hotels.details: Stay in traditional huts with camel rides and folk performances.

hotels.name: Green Valley Eco Resort
hotels.details: Eco-friendly resort in the forest with treehouses and organic food.

hotels.name: Lake Palace Retreat
hotels.details: Luxury hotel floating on the lake with royal heritage rooms.

hotels.name: Hilltop Heritage Inn
hotels.details: Classic colonial-style hotel with valley views and vintage decor.

hotels.name: Sunrise Residency
hotels.details: Clean and affordable hotel near the beach and marina mall.

hotels.name: Blue Lagoon Resort
hotels.details: Island resort with scuba diving, snorkeling, and beach cottages.

hotels.name: Royal Orchid Palace
hotels.details: 5-star palace hotel with spa, pool, and traditional Mysore cuisine.
